# NSButton.BezelStyle.pushDisclosure

**Case**

A bezel style push button with a disclosure triangle.

## Declaration

```swift
case pushDisclosure
```

## Discussion

Use this style of button when you want your button to look like a disclosure button, commonly seen in toolbars on macOS.



For design guidance, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/buttons].

## Disclosure

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.disclosure**: A bezel style button for use with a disclosure triangle.
